alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 12:39PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Davidson and west central Wilson Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1238 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hermitage, or near Nashville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Lakewood, Hermitage, Old Hickory, Rural Hill, Antioch, Belinda City, Berry Hill, Green Hill and Percy Priest Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 210 and 227. Interstate 65 near mile marker 82. Interstate 24 between mile markers 49 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
